TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ActiveDirectorySite extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 類別會定義一組速度和成本上都連接良好的網域控制站。

span.span: The class defines a set of domain controllers that are well-connected in terms of speed and cost.

summary.span: 站台物件是由一組一或多個 IP 子網路所組成。

span.span: A site object consists of a set of one or more IP subnets.

Docs.exception:
下列任何一項原因都可能導致這個例外狀況發生。
This exception will occur for any one of the following reasons:
- 參數中的目標不是樹系、組態集、網域控制站或 AD LDS 伺服器。The target in the parameter is not a forest, configuration set, domain controller, or an AD LDS server.
- 為空字串。 is an empty string.

exception.span: 或 為 。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::DirectoryServices::ActiveDirectory::DirectoryServer ^ InterSiteTopologyGenerator { System::DirectoryServices::ActiveDirectory::DirectoryServer ^ get(); void set(System::DirectoryServices::ActiveDirectory::DirectoryServer ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定當做站台間拓撲產生器的目錄伺服器。

span.span: Gets or sets the directory server that serves as the inter-site topology generator.

value.span: 讀取 / 寫入 物件，表示當做站台間拓撲產生器的目錄伺服器。

span.span: A read/write object that represents the directory server that serves as the inter-site topology generator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要確保站台間連線物件的修改不覆寫知識一致性檢查程式 (KCC)，您必須進行修改，已修改的站台內具有 ISTG （站台間拓撲產生器） 角色的電腦上連接物件。To ensure that the modification of an inter-site connection object is not overwritten by the Knowledge Consistency Checker (KCC), you must make the modification on the computer that has the ISTG (Inter-Site Topology Generator) role in the site of the modified connection object.

exception.span: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

span.span: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

exception.span: 目標伺服器忙碌或無法使用。

span.span: The target server is either busy or unavailable.

exception.span: 不支援此傳輸類型。

span.span: The transport type is not supported.

exception.span: 物件已被處置。

span.span: The object has been disposed.
